amendment.description: Amendment restores to the face, or the obverse, of the dollar coin the words "In God We Trust" and "E Pluribus Unum.".
amendment.purpose: An amendment to limit the use of funds to implement section 5112 of title 31 United States Code.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wicker amendment (A030) Agreed to by recorded vote: 295 - 127 (Roll no. 598).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A030) offered by Mr. Wicker.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
